original_text:
The rod and reproof give wisdom,
    but a child left to himself brings shame to his mother.
korean_text: 채찍과 꾸지람이 지혜를 주거늘 임의로 행하게 버려 둔 자식은 어미를 욕되게 하느니라

sentences.original_text: The rod and reproof give wisdom
but a child left to himself brings shame to his mother.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 제멋대로 방치된 아이는 어머니를 부끄럽게 합니다
